text: Buk - akustycznie (Beech - acoustic) is the second album by Polish thrash metal band Kat & Roman Kostrzewski, released on 8 September 2014 by the label Mystic Production.http://www.metal- archives.com/albums/Kat_%26_Roman_Kostrzewski/Buk_-__Akustycznie/407615 It consists of acoustic re-recordings of material previously released by Kat and by Kat & Roman Kostrzewski on their previous album. It peaked at 7th place on the Polish Official Sales Chart. ==Track listing== Note: Tracks 1 and 6 originally appear on 666.http://www.metal-archives.com/albums/Kat/666/12986 Tracks 2 and 7 originally appear on Oddech wymarłych światów.http://www.metal- archives.com/albums/Kat/Oddech_wymar%C5%82ych_%C5%9Bwiat%C3%B3w/12988 Track 3 originally appears on Bastard.http://www.metal- archives.com/albums/Kat/Bastard/12989 Tracks 8 originally appears on Ballady, alongside re-recordings of tracks 1, 3, and 7.http://www.metal-archives.com/albums/Kat/Ballady/12990 Track 4 originally appears on Róże miłości najchętniej przyjmują się na grobach.http://www.metal- archives.com/albums/Kat/...R%C3%B3%C5%BCe_mi%C5%82o%C5%9Bci_najch%C4%99tniej_przyjmuj%C4%85_si%C4%99_na_grobach/12993 Tracks 5, 11 and 12 originally appear on Szydercze zwierciadło.http://www.metal- archives.com/albums/Kat/Szydercze_zwierciad%C5%82o/12994 Tracks 9 and 10 originally appear on Biało-czarna. ==Personnel== Kat & Roman Kostrzewski * Roman Kostrzewski – vocals * Krzysztof "Pistolet" Pistelok – guitars * Michał Laksa – bass * Piotr Radecki – guitars Additional musicians * Piotr "Pienał" Pęczek – drums ==References== Category:2014 albums Category:Kat & Roman Kostrzewski albums Category:Mystic Production albums Category:Polish- language albums
title: Buk - akustycznie
